message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 is my initial offer, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $17,000?  I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, Alice. However, $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
